Reviews.Title: Very good service
Reviews.Author: David Lancaster
Reviews.Content: The camera and the lenses are great.  Some of the extras in the package are very usefull such as the memory card, various cords, and the camera bag.  My camera bag was defective and DavisMAX sent a new one out immediately.  I found there attention to this matter was great.  The flash and tripod are substandard, but I knew this would be the case and my decision to purchase the package was based on the camera and one of the lenses.  I would have paid more for a good flash and tripod though.  I will shop at Davis MAX again if I see a product of value

Reviews.Title: Great company!
Reviews.Author: Derica Wilson
Reviews.Content: Everything was great! I was a little skeptical at first because I thought it was too good to be true. Everything arrived on time in a box brand new  with all my warrant's. I was very pleased! They all work correctly with no problems!

Reviews.Title: Canon EOSIN 6D
Reviews.Author: Pete Hayes
Reviews.Content: Outstanding camera.  Has more features than I can learn but working on it.  Excellent pictures and relatively easy to use.  The L lenses are worth every penny .  Buy it, you'll like it!
